MS MCQs

    Set up fixed asset posting groups in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. When setting up FA posting groups, you can enter allocations for fixed assets. What can you use these fixed assets allocations for?

      To allocate depreciation percentages to an FA posting group

      To allocate the G/L account to which insurance costs are posted

      To allocate classes and subclasses to each FA posting group

      To allocate the amount in the fixed asset G/L journal to several accounts and/or dimensions


    2. How many fixed asset posting groups can you create in Business Central?

      You can create one fixed asset posting group for each FA class.

      You can create one fixed asset posting group for each FA subclass.

      You can create one fixed asset posting group for each depreciation book.

      You can create as many as you need.
